messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 1210
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/16/2006 11:27:28 P.M. Eastern Standard Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: Anyway, I see Harry Potter as my reward that I get
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/16/2006 11:27:28 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:

Anyway, I see Harry Potter as my reward that I get to read right
before I go to sleep. I look forward to it all day and enjoy my
habit of nightly reading. I keep reading the books over and over,
and eventually I will have to find something else.




Eragon and Eldest are two good books. They were written by a homeschooled
teen and I read them for that reason. They are fantasy fiction, not my usual
genre but I really enjoyed them. The author's name is: Christopher Paolini
(if I remember correctly, names are not my thing) BTW I really enjoyed the
Harry Potter books as well.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
